snippet.title: Sakura X Clash (SAGE 2023 Trailer)
snippet.description:
The release trailer for sXc's official update at this years SAGE, featuring 2 new characters, 2 new stages, new songs, and a bunch of balance changes! 

►Play sXc NOW at http://sakuraxclash.com!
►Follow our twitter: https://twitter.com/ProjectSakuraX

====ABOUT SXC==== 
 
Sakura X Clash - Last Millenial Spring -, is a IKEMEN-based fighting game, that pays homage to arcade classics such as The King of Fighters and Street Fighter.
  sXc also uses NGPC-styled graphics and aesthetic, aiming for a simple yet deep gameplay experience, making the game easy to pickup and play for begginers, but with a lot of depth for those who want to master it.
  Featuring a (quite literally) colorful and constantly expanding cast of characters, each with its on gameplay style and unique quirks.
  Made by a small development team, we strive to create a welcoming experience for both newcomers and veterans to fighting games, without sacrificing any of the core values you would expect of the genre.
